subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Cilic, seeded 14th, beat second-seeded Federer in straight sets and will face Kei Nishikori, who upset top-seeded Novak Djokovic, in Monday’s final.
snippet: Cilic, seeded 14th, beat second-seeded Federer in straight sets and will face Kei Nishikori, who upset top-seeded Novak Djokovic, in Monday’s final.
